an5.124:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato gilanupatthako nalam gilanam upatthatum.
an5.124:1.4: sappayasappayam na janati, asappayam upanameti, sappayam apanameti;
an5.124:1.6: jegucchi hoti uccaram va passavam va vantam va khelam va niharitum;
an5.124:1.7: nappatibalo hoti gilanam kalena kalam dhammiya kathaya sandassetum samadapetum samuttejetum sampahamsetum.
an5.124:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato gilanupatthako nalam gilanam upatthatum.
an5.124:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato gilanupatthako alam gilanam upatthatum.
an5.124:2.4: sappayasappayam janati, asappayam apanameti, sappayam upanameti;
an5.124:2.6: ajegucchi hoti uccaram va passavam va vantam va khelam va niharitum;
an5.124:2.7: patibalo hoti gilanam kalena kalam dhammiya kathaya sandassetum samadapetum samuttejetum sampahamsetum.
an5.124:2.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato gilanupatthako alam gilanam upatthatun”ti.
